title: [Idea] Alternate RP purchasing method
body:
With the recently announced changes to RP costs I figured this would be a good time to suggest this.

A few months ago Wargaming introduced an alternate method for purchasing in-game currency called "[Gift Cards for Gold](http://worldoftanks.com/en/news/pc-browser/31/gift-cards-for-gold/?emst=hBm206Wn7I_114576_260166_2)". Basically what it does is allow people to purchase the in-game currency (RP in the case of LoL) using gift cards that would otherwise go unused.
**Advantages:**
- Allows people to use gift cards that would otherwise not be used.
- Allows people to get a bit more RP if they have the spare gift cards.
- It's entirely voluntary! Meaning you don't have to use it!
**Disadvantages:**
- Reduced RP rate. This is due to the cards not actually being purposed for Riot. Essentially the company/business the gift card is for would charge a small rate to allow people to purchase in-game currency (RP in LoL) using the card.
